name: Symphony of the mind
description:
Help Beethoven write his song by chasing all bad notes away !

Click the notes to chase them away before they reach Beethoven !

Green ones should not be clicked, at 10 collected you gain one more life

Rests randomly drops from notes and slows down time  !

Survive until the end in order to win !

Made by:

Canas Simon

Pidoux Mathieu Rémi
